title: A2159 nand.
message:
Hello everyone, i got this A2159 macbook pro, and i was wondring if i can change the nand? Also is there any tools needed (to copy data in nand). 
And same for ram is it possible to add ram?

thank you.

title: A2159 nand.
message:
You can use the NANDs from donor board, same model, as easiest option.
You can also use the NANDs from different board model, if had the same SSD capacity.
Just maintain original position of the chips, when solder in the new board.

To use new NANDs, you must initialize them; P13 programmer has been mentioned several times on the forum.

Consult pages 12 & 93 for RAM and SSD options.

title: A2159 nand.
message:
Thank you for reply, ok so nand not encrypted with T2? 
I don’t need to copy data for the original nand?

title: A2159 nand.
message: SSD data is lost, once any NAND chip is bad.
